content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
＊This product contains updated Contents for 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms 13.'
Please note that without the original game on the same platform, this product will not start up.

Live the Three Kingdoms with extreme Officer Play!
With 'Prestige,' which might be called an officer's defining title and with Comrades to aid you in carrying out your desires, players will experience greater freedom and plumb greater depths with their Officer Play.
With all this and more, come and experience the ultimate Officer Play!
Live the Three Kingdoms with extreme Officer Play!
This set contains below contents.
RTK13: Fame and Strategy Expansion Pack
Fan selected Officer Graphic Set
Original Event
BGM Set 1-4
Legendary Officers Set 1-3
Scenario-The God of War, Surrounded/ The Tyrant Returns/ Battle for the Han Court
RTK Commemorative Contents
Officer CG Set 2-3

1 Players
HDD 22MB Minimum
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
HD Video Output: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
Online Mode: Online Play (Optional)
PS4 Pro：Enhanced

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIII: Fame and Strategy Expansion Pack (C) 2016, 2017 KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD. All rights reserved. Published by KOEI TECMO AMERICA CORP. Developed by KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD. ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS and the KOEI logo are registered trademarks of KOEI TECMO GAMES CO., LTD.
